MS MCQs

    Recognize entities in text with the text analytics API

    »

    1. What is the purpose of entity linking?

      Links one entity to another of the same category.

      Provide a Bing or Google search engine URL to identify the item in the entity.

      Customize linked entities to your own organization’s list of entity elements.


    2. What is the purpose of the ID attribute in the input and output JSON?

      Identifies the calling application.

      Differentiate between multiple entries in the input and map them to the correct output values.

      Identify the language used in the input document text.


    3. What is the purpose of a sub type in the entity types?

      They provide a link to a description of the core type.

      To clarify or further enhance the core type.

      To specify optional entities.
